description: faa digital obstacle file (dof) for obstacle repository system (ors)
faa obstruction evaluation - airport airspace analysis (oe-aaa) aeronautical study number (asn)
usgs id from prior turbine dataset
eia plant id from eia form 860
state and county fips where turbine is located
indicator of whether the turbine has been partially retrofitted after initial construction
year in which turbine was retrofitted
date of image used to visually verify turbine location
source of image used to visually verify turbine location
Not visually verified: Point has not been visually verified yet
No confidence: No turbine shown in image; image has clouds; imagery older than turbine built date
Partial confidence: image shows a developed pad with concrete base and/or turbine parts on the ground
Full confidence: image shows an installed turbine or a tower being constructed; at least partially installed
Not verified: attributes have not been verified
No confidence: no facility data, no name, nothing in publications
Partial confidence: incomplete information or significant discrepancies across data sources
Full confidence: consistent information across multiple data sources
Turbine has not been significantly retrofitted since initial construction
Turbine has been significantly retrofitted (i.e., new blades and/or nacelle) after initial construction
